sentences.sContent: He claims that imperialists are trying to re-establish colonial rule in the country.
sentences.sCn: 他声称帝国主义者正试图在该国重建殖民统治。

sentences.sContent: The developed nations have all benefited from their imperialist exploitation.
sentences.sCn: 发达国家都从他们帝国主义的剥削中获益。

words.tran: 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的
帝国主义的；帝国主义者的；拥护帝国主义的
帝王般地；威严地；帝国地

trans.tranOther: An imperialist is someone who has imperialist views
Imperialist means relating to or based on imperialism
